meta_description: The World Chess Hall of Fame in St Louis MO brings chess fans together through special events, art exhibits, music events, the Halls of Fame, and more.
collections_text:
Discover the Magic of Chess

## Where Strategy Meets Legacy

[ Learn More ](http://web.archive.org/web/20260114070111/https://worldchesshof.org/about/) [ Donate ](http://web.archive.org/web/20260114070111/https://saintlouischessclub.kindful.com/embeds/e78acae5-2c52-4bd9-b848-134248f13564)

Welcome to the **World Chess Hall of Fame & Galleries** in **Saint Louis, Missouri**! We invite everyone, from absolute beginners to experts, to explore the captivating world of chess. Discover the rich **history** , fascinating **strategy** , and vibrant **culture** of the game through stunning **art and history exhibits** and engaging **educational programs**. Our interactive displays make learning about chess exciting and accessible. Explore, be inspired, and see how this timeless game connects to so much more!
